property.name: createWigFileQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.bed_graph ( bed_graph_id, bio_data_item_id, reference_genome_id, index_id, compressed) VALUES ( :BED_GRAPH_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID, :INDEX_ID, :COMPRESSED)

property.name: loadWigFileQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_by, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, bg.bed_graph_id, bg.reference_genome_id as bed_graph_reference_genome_id, bg.compressed as bed_graph_compressed,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.created_by as index_created_by, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.bed_graph bg JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON bg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = bg.index_id WHERE bg.bed_graph_id = ?

property.name: loadWigFilesByReferenceIdQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_by, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, bg.bed_graph_id, bg.reference_genome_id as bed_graph_reference_genome_id, bg.compressed as bed_graph_compressed,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.created_by as index_created_by, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.bed_graph bg JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON bg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = bg.index_id WHERE bg.reference_genome_id = ?
